articles.author: Christopher Carbone
articles.title: Digit, a walking package-delivery robot, is now for sale
articles.description: Interested in a robot that can deliver packages? It'll set you back six figures.
articles.content:
Interested in a robot that can deliver packages? It'll set you back six figures.
The American startup Agility Robotics announced Monday that its bipedal robot is now for sale. Known as Digit, the machine is the size and shape of a small adult human and can c… [+1435 chars]
